1233290.name: The Poisoner - Complete Story
1233290.description:
An experienced detective with several enigmatic cases under your belt, you’re not easily shaken. But this time it’s different. The killer is taunting you, deliberately leaving clues in your path and putting your life at stake if you don’t find them.

This is no simple scavenger hunt. The details of each clue are gravely significant. Use every ounce of your intuition and leave no stone unturned as you explore the foreboding crime scenes. Meanwhile, every tick of the clock is one step closer to your doom because if you don’t find the life-saving antidote in time, it’s lights out forever.

In The Poisoner (Complete Story) you’ll have to solve challenges in all four unique locations in order to learn the full history of the psychotic mastermind behind these macabre puzzles.

Features:

• Fully interactive environment
• Telekinesis - use it to grab things
• Check the hints on your smartwatch when you’re stuck

Find the Poisoner... before he finds you.
1233290.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
